system.availability: When Worn, once per encounter at the start of turn, can make +10 Willpower Test, with -10 per ally they wish to affect. If successful, gain bonuses depending on DoS: 1 Dos: Reroll Melee Damage, gain Zealous Hatred on 9+. 2 DoS: Also add +2 to PEN. 3 DoS: Increase Pen to +4. 4+ DoS: Zealous Hatred occurs on 8+. Effects last for WP Bonus Rounds.
system.cost: Must have Mark of Khorne to use. Affected allies must either be Unaligned or Dedicated to Khorne. Heretical.
